Text:
Woot!

Thanks so much for this! :)

Is everything only in French, or in English as well?
@Beelzy When I rip the DVD, the language it is in french. but in the package, he say fr en de it es.

Ah oki, thanks!

I'll try it out anyway. Already have the game and platform for Wii, so just wanted a version for the PC as well.

Kudos :)
For mount the iso, use daemon tools pro with SCSI driver. Else the game doesn't start ;)

I did download and install it successfully, but if you want to play the game you will receive an error that you have to have the usb playform thing in order to continue.
So you can only download but not play =/
GAme is multy, just run setup.exe, u  need USB portal of power to play.
